Title: 41766 - # Reasons Why It's Important to Buy the Right Kind of Noise Canceling Earbuds
Direction: 675 words. Write four to eight reasons why it's important to get the right type of noise canceling earbuds. Noise canceling technology comes in different forms, and what works in one type of noisy environment won't work in another. Point out the difference between fitted earbuds and ones that use active noise cancelling technology. Focus on an audience that works in a variety of work spaces that range from an open plan office to business travelers dealing with jet engine noise. Your placement site gives information on Android devices, so make sure to keep this piece relevant by talking about using noise canceling earbuds with an Android smartphone or tablet. Consider linking the client URL to a sentence that talks about buying earbuds that use the latest technology for the best possible noise canceling effect. Please make sure you link to other products in this article to make the Sony link less obvious. However, make sure that none of the products you link to are competitors of Sony.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: the right sound canceling earbuds for you
